Articles.Content:
What?

The next user has a virtual weapon on KSP.

Nope.

The user below me knows about the maker movement (AKA Maker Fair)

What? (Though i haven't been quite on the forum hype train in a while...) I am curious as to what it is, however.

The user below me has put a 40t plus load into orbit in one go.

Well yes if launching all three modules for your space station count.

The User below me now knows that the maker fair is were people of all kinds show off what they created.(For example 13 yr Kid made a 3D printer that Make now sells)

I have no idea what was just said...

The user below me mourns this night...

Who doesn't here...

The user below feels the same.

Right, as many of us...

The user below hopes things will be better tomorrow.

I do hope for a greater good ,and not to mention were humans....Oh this will be great!

The user below me can see a DW speech i referenced.

No clue what you're talking about.

The user below me finds this circlejerk rather hilarious.

Not really. Also what's a circlejerk?

The user below me is part of the angry/sad group of user who know what happened tonight.

Not really sad or angry, more suprised and slightly baffled.

The user below me worships the flying spaghetti monster.

False.

User below me has seen the flying teapot in real life.

I wish.

The user below me is an alien!

Nope

The user below me lives in North America

False. Antarctica.

The user below me reads manga.

I used to.

The user below me has no opinion re Star Trek vs Star Wars

True. Only because I final found out Next Gen was actuality good. Kirk still sucks.

The user below me has seen a solar eclipse.

It's on the bucket list...

The user below me has experienced an earthquake.

Of course the were i live the San Andres fault lies here.

The user below me lives west of the united states.

Depending on what part of it you're talking about...

The user belong me is a longtime forum gamer

Yes.

The user below me is in the state of California.

False.

User below me knows how to speak Tagalog/Filipino.

Nope.

The user below me has heard of the Maker fair.

Nope.

The user below me tapdances among penguins.

False.

User below me is a penguin and will now tap dance on me.
